Upbrat Party Band

High frequency, a high energy party five piece from Essex playing uplifting floor fillers from the swinging 60s to the present day including Stevie Wonder, Tina Turner, James Brown, Otis Reading, Johnny Cash, Chuck Berry, Dolly Parton, The Who, The Beatles, Kinks, T Rex, Bon Jovi, Oasis, Reef, Stereophonics, Kings of Leon, and many more.
